item.title: CVE-2022-21385|2024-09-23T18:26:39.676Z -- oracle%20corporation -- oracle%20linux
item.description: A flaw in net_rds_alloc_sgs() in Oracle Linux kernels allows unprivileged local users to crash the machine. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 6.2 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector (CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H)
